titles.title: Have You Any Room for Jesus

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Have you any room for Jesus, He who bore your load of sin? As He knocks and asks admission, Sinners, will you let Him in?

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Room for Jesus, King of glory! Hasten now His Word obey; Swing the heart’s door widely open, Bid Him enter while you may.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Room for pleasure, room for business, But for Christ the Crucified, Not a place that He can enter, In the heart for which He died?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Have you any room for Jesus, As in grace He calls again? O today is time accepted, Tomorrow you may call in vain.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Room and time now give to Jesus, Soon will pass God’s day of grace; Soon thy heart left cold and silent, And thy Savior’s pleading cease.
